text: Vibhacari isatari ate vibhacari bade dovam vicom hara ika nu sau kaure maro. Ate tuhanu inham dovam la'i alaha de dina (dharama) de mamale vica rahima nahim a'una cahida hai. Jekara tusim alaha ate praloka de dina upara visavasa rakhade ho. Ate cahida hai ki dovam nu dada dena de same musalamana da ika varaga hazara rahe
